Function Documentation

double calcGaussianWithExpTail ( const double  z,
const double  zCut,
const double  factor 
)

Utility function to calculate probability from Gaussian distibution with an exponential tail given the mean and standard deviation.

Parameters:
x - the observation
mu - mean of the gaussian distribution
sigma - standard deviation of the gaussian distribution
weight - the weight
zCut - where the exponential part starts
useWeight - flag to indicate whether weight should be used or not
Returns:
the probability of x from the given Gaussian distribution

Utility function to calculate probability from Gaussian distibution with an exponential tail given the mean and standard deviation.

Parameters:
z - the z value
zCut - where the exponential part starts
factor - a scale factor
Returns:
the value of z
